attributes.action: Stricter deforestation rules in the uk
attributes.additional_details: There is no planet b. Norway have completely abolished deforestation and as the United Kingdom we the youth believe we can make steps towards this
attributes.background: The uk currently have laws in place for tree health which we strongly support. However we need a definite future for our planet with 135 months left to save it. We believe it should be illegal to destroy a certain amount of hectors of trees each year in the uk and these must be replanted
